it works for me. Without mounting or burning.
Just 
-unpack both cds 
-install with setup.exe in cd1
-copy the crack to the gamefolder where you installed it 
-play

THERES NO BURNING OR EXTRA PROGRAMS REQUIRED FOR THIS GAME TO RUN.

1. Once d/l is finished, extract both RAR files.

2. OPEN THE "CRACK" FOLDER AND COPY THE FILE.

2. Go back to the folder where all the files are and Click on AUTORUN and chose INSTALL.

3. When d/l installation completes, X out of the game and go to youre PROGRAMS FOLDER.

4. PASTE THE CRACK

YOURE DONE.

2. Install the game off of CD! then it willl prompt for CD2 and give you the option to open it via a folder just browse to the folder and hit OK.

3. I put the shortcut to the game on my desktop. Now go back to cd1 copy the crack go to the program files and paste it in you Playboy the mansion folder.
